# General Graph Grammar


ggplot(data = <DATA>) +   
  <GEOM_FUNCTION>(  
     mapping = aes( < MAPPINGS > ),  
     stat = < STAT > ,   
     position = < POSITION >  
  ) +  
  < COORDINATE_FUNCTION > +  
  < FACET_FUNCTION >
